name: mortgage-ai-advanced-browser-testing
description: Advanced browser-based testing with Puppeteer MCP and Selenium MCP for comprehensive mortgage system validation

scripts.test:puppeteer: node -e "const { PuppeteerMCP } = require('./advanced-browser-testing'); const mcp = new PuppeteerMCP(); mcp.initialize().then(() => console.log('Puppeteer MCP ready')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:selenium: node -e "const { SeleniumMCP } = require('./advanced-browser-testing'); const mcp = new SeleniumMCP(); mcp.initialize().then(() => console.log('Selenium MCP ready')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:performance: node -e "const { runAdvancedBrowserTests } = require('./advanced-browser-testing'); runAdvancedBrowserTests({ runSeleniumTests: false, runAccessibilityTests: false, runVisualRegressionTests: false }).then(r => console.log('Performance tests completed')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:accessibility: node -e "const { runAdvancedBrowserTests } = require('./advanced-browser-testing'); runAdvancedBrowserTests({ runSeleniumTests: false, runPerformanceTests: false, runVisualRegressionTests: false }).then(r => console.log('Accessibility tests completed')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.test:cross-browser: node -e "const { runAdvancedBrowserTests } = require('./advanced-browser-testing'); runAdvancedBrowserTests({ browsers: ['chrome', 'firefox', 'edge'], runPuppeteerTests: false }).then(r => console.log('Cross-browser tests completed')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.install-drivers: npm run install:chrome && npm run install:firefox && npm run install:edge

author: MortgageAI Testing Team
